Our Story: Becoming H.E.R.O.

We are the H.E.R.O Consulting group. We belive in Human Empowerment and Resource Optimization. Our mission is built on the belief that empowered humans create extraordinary outcomes.

Our Vision: The Power of Potential

In a world obsessed with new technology, we refocus on the most valuable asset: the human. We don't just teach skills; we instill the confidence and provide the frameworks necessary for every individual to become a driving force for success.

H.E.R.O. was founded to bridge the gap between inherent ability and realized performance. By focusing on communication, leadership development, and intelligent resource optimization, we help organizations build resilient, high-performing cultures.

Explore Our Programs

Fidel Guzman

Fidel Guzman is a seasoned Training and Development leader and founder of H.E.R.O. Consulting Group, driven by a deep-seated passion for Human Empowerment. His expertise lies in transforming potential into high-impact performance across the financial technology and services industries.

A Journey of Voice and Confidence

Fidel's personal journey—from overcoming a stutter to becoming a prominent public speaker and leader—is the foundation of the H.E.R.O. philosophy. His dedication to organizations like Toastmasters highlights his belief that authenticity boosts confidence, and that everyone deserves to find their voice.

Expertise in Optimization & Growth

  • Customized Training & Development: Tailoring approaches to individual needs, a key principle of resource optimization.
  • Sales Enablement: Providing comprehensive training that drives sustained results beyond onboarding.
  • Leadership & Management: Building strong, capable leaders who can motivate and guide teams effectively.

Ready to Empower Your Team?

Partner with H.E.R.O. Consulting to unlock the full potential of your greatest resource—your people.

Get Started Today Schedule a Consultation

Empowered humans create extraordinary outcomes. We ignite potential through insight, guidance, and growth.
